text: Die Dresdner Philharmoniker is an East German documentary film. It follows the Dresden Philharmonic and its artistic manager Heinz Bongartz on a tour to Czechoslovakia, France, Hungary and Romania. It was directed by Joachim Kunert and released in 1955. ==External links== * Category:1955 films Category:East German films Category:German-language films Category:Documentary films about classical music and musicians
title: Die Dresdner Philharmoniker
